scripts.copy-web-to-esp32: npm run build:web && cp -r web/smart-birdhouse/dist/* esp32/data/
scripts.upload: npm run generate-secrets && cd esp32 && ~/.platformio/penv/bin/pio run -t upload
scripts.reflash: npm run generate-secrets && cd esp32 && ~/.platformio/penv/bin/pio run -t erase && ~/.platformio/penv/bin/pio run -t upload
